seo_label.title: SEO of the link
seo_label.description:
Don't duplicate the link text!
It's supposed to provide supplementary information and let the users know where the link will direct them to if they click on it.

steps.heading: Step 1
steps.description: Ensure water tank is filled with fresh potable water. Then turn your machine ON and wait 25s for the steady lights.

steps.heading: Step 2
steps.description: Lift the lever completely and insert your capsule into the slot.

steps.heading: Step 3
steps.description: Lower the lever and place your cup under the coffee outlet.

steps.heading: Step 4
steps.description: Press the Espresso (40ml) or Lungo (110ml) button to start. It will stop automatically, but you can stop it manually by pressing again.

steps.heading: Step 5
steps.description: Once finished, lift the lever to eject the capsule into the used capsule container.

steps.heading: Step 6
steps.description: Enjoy your coffee!

steps.heading: Step 1
steps.description: Ensure water tank is filled with fresh potable water.

steps.heading: Step 2
steps.description: Turn your machine ON by pressing the button and wait 30s while machine is heating up. When the button is steady white, the machine is ready to use.

steps.heading: Step 3
steps.description: Unlock the lever and open the machine completely to put your Vertuo capsule. Close the head & turn the handle left to the lock symbol.

steps.heading: Step 4
steps.description: Adjust the position of the cup support & place your cup under the coffee outlet.

steps.heading: Step 5
steps.description: Press the button to start your coffee preparation. It will stop automatically, but you can stop it manually by pressing again.

steps.heading: Step 6
steps.description: Once finished, a steady light will appear. Turn the handle to the right and open the head to automatically eject the capsule into the used capsule container.

steps.heading: Step 7
steps.description: Enjoy your coffee!

steps.heading: Step 1
steps.description: Ensure water tank is filled with fresh potable water.

steps.heading: Step 2
steps.description: Turn your machine ON by pressing the button and wait 40s while machine is heating up. When the light is steady green, the machine is ready to use.

steps.heading: Step 3
steps.description: Open the machine by slightly pushing the lever upwards – the head will open automatically - and insert your Vertuo capsule. Push the lever down.

steps.heading: Step 4
steps.description: Adjust the position of the cup support & place your cup under the coffee outlet.

steps.heading: Step 5
steps.description: Press the coffee button to start your coffee preparation. It will stop automatically, but you can stop it manually by pressing again.

steps.heading: Step 6
steps.description: Once finished, a steady light will appear. Open the head to automatically eject the capsule into the used capsule container.

steps.heading: Step 6
steps.description: Enjoy your coffee!

steps.heading: Step 1
steps.description: Insert your capsule into the slot located on top of where you placed your cup.

steps.heading: Step 2
steps.description: Lower the lever on the side where the cup is placed.

steps.heading: Step 3
steps.description: Select your coffee - Ristretto, Espresso or Lungo - from the buttons above your cup or select your milk-coffee recipe from the list in the top right-hand corner.

steps.heading: Step 4
steps.description: Once finished, lift the lever on the side where the coffee is placed and enjoy your coffee.

steps.heading: Step 1
steps.description: Ensure water tank is filled with fresh potable water and switch on the machine.

steps.heading: Step 2
steps.description: Open the lever and insert your capsule into the slot located on top  of where you placed your cup.

steps.heading: Step 3
steps.description: Lower the lever. Select your coffee - Ristretto, Espresso or Lungo - from the buttons above your cup.

steps.heading: Step 4
steps.description: Once finished, lift the lever on the side where the coffee is placed.

steps.heading: Hot Water
steps.description: Place the cup on the tray and press the hot water button.

steps.heading: Step 1
steps.description: Place your cup under one of the coffee extraction heads.

steps.heading: Step 2
steps.description: Insert your capsule into the slot located on top of where you placed your cup.

steps.heading: Step 3
steps.description: Select your coffee – Ristretto, Espresso or Lungo - from the buttons above your cup.

steps.heading: Step 4
steps.description: For a Machiatto, place your cup underneath the milk frother and press the «+» button briefly for a touch of milk froth.

steps.heading: Step 5
steps.description: For a Cappuccino, move the dial on the Autocappucinatore to the left. For a a Latte, press the cup button in addition for milk to start pouring into your cup.

steps.heading: Step 6
steps.description: Once finished, a steady light will appear, and your capsule will be automatically ejected into the used capsule container. Enjoy your coffee!
